content:
From: Alya Abbott <alya@zulip.com>
An email sent into Zulip shows up as coming from "Email Gateway". I wonder
if we should rename the sender to something less technical-sounding? E.g.,
"Sent via email"?

Mmm, I feel like the above message could also use a bit of formatting. Like this?

From: Alya Abbott <alya@zulip.com>

An email sent into Zulip shows up as coming from "Email Gateway". I wonder
if we should rename the sender to something less technical-sounding? E.g.,
"Sent via email"?
The formatting changes would be easy tweaks, I think.
I think other names are options but I think "Sent via email" doesn't feel quite right to me.
